posts.postText:
This is more of a raffle than a contest.

So I just recently learned how to implement a trail onto the puzzle server, so I got the OK to make this thread. Put your name below and either provide a link to a picture, a picture, or something saying what you want (Example: I want a mudkip.) (I put that example because I JUST FREAKING PUT ON A MUDKIP TRAIL. HELL YES)

In order to enter:
-No requirements, just post below. ONE entry per a person

Rules:
-No pornography
-Nothing offensive
-No clan or group advertisements 
-Nothing user-specific if it's a trail allowed for everyone (As in just text with a name. Avatars are OK.)

Deadline to post: April 12th

Winner will be randomly chosen using random.org.

Winner...:

-Receives the trail they picked for free (or at least 1 point)
-Gets to negotiate a price for the trail (No I won't put a trail of your avatar on there for 50000 points, just knowing you get it for free)
-If we find/think of a way, winner gets his trail exclusively.

http://www.geekologie.com/2010/09/03/double-rainbow-for-windows.jpg
(I don't want anything custom, just a rainbow trail if possible ;_;)
It's actually rather easy to make a trail only available for one person.

Update: Transparency will work well if you don't want you trail looking semi-odd. (FunnyRaff.) Also, make sure it loops well. (FunnyRaff.)


And Gash, why didn't you tell me last night? D:

>> http://www.geekologie.com/2010/09/03/double-rainbow-for-windows.jpg
